籤詩版本二:
Nangumiyo amakhalabe wosasintha ndipo amalondera mtsinjewo, wosakhoza kuwuka ndi chiyembekezo chokwera.
Kusintha kodabwitsa m'tsogolomu, Xu Jun adalumphira pachipata cha chinjoka
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuwonetsa chithunzi chosasinthika cha whale.
Khalani oleza mtima mpaka nthawi itakwana.
解曰: Muyenera kupirira. Khalani oleza mtima ndi oleza mtima. Muyenera kudikirira mpaka nthawiyo itafika. Kutchuka kudakalipobe.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Qin Bu Di
M’Nthawi ya Nkhondo za Mayiko, Su Qin, mbadwa ya ku Luoyang, ankalambira Gui Guzi monga mphunzitsi wake.
Su Qin anapempha Mfumu ya Qin ndipo analemba maulendo khumi ndi awiri, koma Mfumu ya Qin sinavomereze mkangano wake. Atafika kunyumba kuja adang'ambika chijasi chake chaubweya chang'ambika ndipo ndalama zidamuthera, anafika pakhomo ali chikwiyire, mkazi wake sanamumvere ndipo mlamu wake sanamuphikire.
Su Qin anachita manyazi ndi kukwiya, choncho anatenga Taigong Yin Fu (buku lonena za luso la nkhondo) n’kuliwerenga mokwiya. Mukakhala osokonezeka komanso waulesi, ingobayani ntchafu yanu ndi chikwanje ndikuwerenganso zikakupwetekani.
Pambuyo pake, chiphunzitso cha He Cong (He Zong) chinagwiritsidwa ntchito kugwirizanitsa mayiko asanu ndi limodzi motsutsana ndi Qin. Anakopa Mfumu Zhao ndikukhala nduna yaikulu ya mayiko asanu ndi limodzi.
聖意: Ndilibe mtendere kunyumba, ndikufunabe kufunafuna chuma, tsoka, kugulitsa, ukwati ndizovuta, Liujia ndi dalitso labwino kwa oyenda pansi, minda yotetezeka, mphutsi za silika ndi zabwino, nyama zisanu ndi imodzi ndi zoipa, anthu akusowa, milandu ya anthu ndi kusamuka, zinthu zotayika, matenda akummwera, kupempherera chitetezo, mapiri ndi manda.
